name: The Surveyor (Lazarus Tegra)
description:
Your job is simple. Travel to a desolate isle, and try to gain any information you can.

Your built in scanner will highlight objects that can be scanned for further information. Objects of major import will have a blue marker around their location. 

There might still be tech on this small land that can still be investigated. 

Good luck, Surveyor.

<W,A,S,D>Move<F>Fly/Land Mode (Toggle)
<E>Interact<RMB (Hold)>Scan<Q>Mission Briefing<C>Controls<TAB>Quit Game Interface

Music by 'Nihilore':

http://www.nihilore.com/
